`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-js",children:`function TreeNode(val, left, right) {
  this.val = val === undefined ? 0 : val;
  this.left = left === undefined ? null : left;
  this.right = right === undefined ? null : right;
}

`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-js",children:`/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * function TreeNode(val, left, right) {
 *     this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val)
 *     this.left = (left===undefined ? null : left)
 *     this.right = (right===undefined ? null : right)
 * }
 */
/**
 * @param {TreeNode} root
 * @param {number} low
 * @param {number} high
 * @return {number}
 */
var rangeSumBST = function (root, low, high) {
  let sum = 0;
  if (root === null) return sum;
  if (root.val > low) {
    sum += rangeSumBST(root.left, low, high);
  }
  if (root.val < high) {
    sum += rangeSumBST(root.right, low, high);
  }
  if (root.val >= low && root.val <= high) {
    sum += root.val;
  }
  return sum;
};
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/songhaeun/Desktop/dev/my-blog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-c646bc0d-0a07-44f5-94b6-03f5bc2216b0.mdx",lineNumber:55,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/songhaeun/Desktop/dev/my-blog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-c646bc0d-0a07-44f5-94b6-03f5bc2216b0.mdx",lineNumber:55,columnNumber:1},this),`
